name: Existence speed
description: Existence speed is a minimal action game. Manage the tunnel to avoid a collision. Three difficulty modes, different shapes and different tunnel animation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: core 2 duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia gt610 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: Realtek Aydio HD

reviews.review_text: Highly addicting. Good concept, but fits better in a mobile game. Not finished at all, and too expensive.
